org.joyrest.transform

Interface Writer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    General, Transformer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReaderWriter, StringReaderWriter

    public interface Writer
extends Transformer
    Provides the methods for writing outcoming entity to outputstream

    pbouda
    See Also:
